quest.name: Free to Sightsee
journal: Alphinaud would send you into the city to explore.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: That silly oaf, where could he be...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Now you've the opportunity to experience Eulmore, I suggest you make the most of it. Explore the city, top to bottom.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In other words, I would start with the Canopy and go from there. Try wandering around the market stalls, mayhap...? Such places are usually filled with colorful characters, only too eager to share local gossip with a friendly visitor.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...I would appreciate it, of course, if you could share any discoveries with me in turn. We should both learn as much as possible about our, ahem, “new place of residence.”

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I shall remain behind and set up my painting paraphernalia. Very carefully and deliberately. It could take some time...

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Oh, hello there. A fresh register, are we? You seem a little lost.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Well, 'tis lovely to make your acquaintance. Ahem, speaking of acquaintances, you wouldn't happen to have run into my attendant on your wanderings, would you? Big strong lad? Long hair, tied back?

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: He was escorting me on a shopping errand when I realized I'd dropped my handkerchief. And now I've been waiting here all alone while he's been off searching for it.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: I'm not terribly fond of being alone. If you do see him, I would be obliged if you could pass on this message: forget the silly handkerchief and return to my side at once!

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: I think I may have lost the handkerchief in the hallway leading into the plaza. My attendant mentioned he would try looking there first.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: Wicked white, that was too close!

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: Thank you, friend. I don't know what I would've done if you hadn't come along.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: I was trying to rescue my lady's handkerchief, you see. The wind must have blown it over the edge, but luckily it caught on something. I thought if I could just stretch out far enough...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You risked your life for a scrap of cloth?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You must think highly of your mistress.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: It's not just a scrap of cloth! Not if it belongs to her.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: I would risk my life and more to spare my mistress but a single moment of sadness.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: She is my entire world! Without her, I am nothing.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: When I first came to Eulmore, I thought only of improving my lot in life.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: But there was so much more to this city than wealth and plenty. There is no war here, no conflict... The residents all treat each other with warmth and respect.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: My mistress has been ever so kind to me, and I can think of no other place in Kholusia where I could possibly be happier!

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: <cough> Sorry, I might've gotten a bit carried away. I find it hard to stop when I start counting my blessings these days.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: Please, you should come with me to meet my lady. Once she hears of your deed, you'll be witness to her generosity firsthand.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: ...What!? Lonely, you say!?

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: Curse my clumsy feet! I must return to her immediately!

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: I will never leave my lady's side again!

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: My attendant told me everything. I am so very grateful you were there to offer your assistance!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You seem a dedicated patron...

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You value him highly, then...

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Oh, my attitude is naught unusual, I assure you. Without the efforts of our bonded residents, we free citizens would not enjoy the pleasures of our daily lives. They are deserving of our unending gratitude.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: As if he were a member of my own family! I could not live the wonderful life I lead without him. We free citizens owe the bonded our unending gratitude.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Mayhap in another society, our different standing would breed prejudice or resentment. But in Eulmore, a most glorious measure is in place to avert such unpleasantness.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Part of that measure requires that the free surrender their fortunes. Upon registration, all of our property─financial, intellectual, or otherwise─is given over to the city.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: In exchange, we are provided with ample funds and commodities to live a life of pampered luxury.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Being liberated from the concern of earning coin has an almost miraculous effect on people's outlook. There are no rivals to compete against, only fellow residents with whom to enjoy our tranquil existence.

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Now, if you'll excuse us, I must see what the markets have to offer as a reward for the return of my handkerchief. Oh, and I've not forgotten you, of course, our courageous messenger-turned-rescuer!
